trans-unit.source: Represents the child controls of containers that support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"></xref>.

This control pattern is analogous to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern> with the distinction that any control supporting <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern> will programmatically expose the relationship between the individual cell and its row and column information.
Access to individual cell functionality is provided by the additional support of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.
Gets the cached property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref>.
Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
To get the current value of a property, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Current%2A>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.
The cached property values.
The requested property is not in the cache.
Identifies the property that retrieves all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.

This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
Gets the current property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref>.
This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> reference in order to get current values.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.
The current property values.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref> control pattern.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.

The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
Identifies the property that retrieves all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.

This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
